reviews.text:
Wanted to have their sandwiches for lunch but was told that this & their breakfast were no longer available since 2020.
Bought some breads (see receipt) & tried a nibble of each. Yummy with a distinct sourdough flavour. Will visit again (soon ðŸ˜œ) to try the other breads & pastries.
Do visit early as breads sell out fast. Preferably before noon time to enjoy the full selection of breads & pastries.

Note to management: Do update your Google page so as to avoid disappointing customers. Thanks & kudos for your great tasting & authentic sourdough breads.
$10.90 for the garlic and sundried tomato sourdough. It was actually phenomenal my goodness. Crust wasn't too hard, the inside was soft and savoury. So good!!

Really is the best sour dough bread I have tasted in my life. We tried the olive garlic one and itâ€™s so savory.. the guy over the counter told us olive, tomato and jalapeÃ±o are the best seller.. the Kouign amann was also unexpectedly good, itâ€™s crunchy crispy on the outside with buttery soft swirl on the insideâ€¦ u will regret not buying more

Very nice sourdough. Cutting service from 12.30pm onwards

Go try the Olive sourdough, sundries tomato and yuzu cranberries sourdough!! Each loaf is about $10 and can feed 6 people as a meal.

Came here for the focaccia bread and sundried tomato sourdough, a big loaf of sourdough can last a few days of breakfast. Like that it is not hard and dense and still have some chewiness. The meat focaccia indeed look like roast pork appearance it comes with a nice crust. Asked for cutting of the sourdough. A simple shop for takeaway of excellent bakery product, donâ€™t expect too much of a service.
